parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent failure of the power steering system can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents or near-misses, especially during low-speed turns or when braking.
symptoms: The power steering system locks up or fails intermittently
making it difficult to steer the vehicle
especially during turns or when braking; the steering wheel is hard to turn or feels heavy; the vehicle drifts or darts in both directions while braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering pump can cause the power steering system to fail, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The power steering pump leaks or fails
causing the power steering system to malfunction; the steering wheel is hard to turn or feels heavy; the vehicle is difficult to steer
especially during turns or when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The wear of the idler arm can cause the vehicle to drift or dart in both directions while driving, increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The vehicle drifts or darts in both directions while driving; the steering wheel is hard to turn or feels heavy; the idler arm is worn or loose.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the power steering hose can cause the power steering system to malfunction, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: The power steering hose is damaged or leaking
causing the power steering system to malfunction; the steering wheel is hard to turn or feels heavy; the vehicle is difficult to steer
especially during turns or when braking.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Heater Core Failure due to Dex-Cool Antifreeze
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heater core can cause impaired rear vision, reduced visibility, and increased risk of accidents, especially at night.
symptoms: and repeated flushing of the system.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the windshield wiper linkage can cause reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially during inclement weather.
symptoms: Broken or failed windshield wiper linkage

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cooling system can cause overheating, engine damage, and increased risk of accidents.
The failure of the odometer instrument cluster can cause the odometer to fail, leading to inaccurate mileage readings and potential electrical fires.
The failure of the alternator can cause the vehicle's electrical systems to malfunction, leading to loss of speedometer function, dimming headlights, and potentially causing accidents.
The failure of the differential cover gasket can cause the outer axle bearings and axles to be damaged, leading to rear end failure, accidents, and high repair costs.
The failure of the transmission can cause the vehicle to malfunction, leading to accidents and high repair costs.
The failure of the oil cooler lines can cause oil leaks, leading to engine damage and potential accidents.
The failure of the fuel pump wiring harness can cause the fuel pump to short circuit, leading to a blown fuse, engine stall, and potentially a catastrophic fire in the fuel tank.
symptoms: The fuel pump fuse blows out
the engine stalls or dies while driving
the fuel pump wiring harness is damaged or melted
the fuel pump sender unit is faulty.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel pump can cause the engine to stall or die, leading to a loss of power and potentially causing an accident.
symptoms: The engine stalls or dies while driving
the fuel pump fuse blows out
the fuel pump sender unit is faulty.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel line can cause a fuel leak, leading to a potential fire hazard in the engine compartment.
symptoms: The fuel line is damaged or cracked
the fuel line is exposed to high temperatures
the fuel line is vulnerable to chafing or sharp objects.
